property.name: text
property.value: Hybrid model of a plant where a continuous flow of raw material is directed into bottles as the bottles (jobs) arrive. The top level is a discrete- event model with a modal continuous-time model inside. Model parameters are to the right.

property.name: text
property.value: This model uses a PoissonClock to simulate the random arrival of events. Contrast this with the HybridPlant model which uses a Clock to simulate a deterministic arrival of events.

property.name: text
property.value: Filling the bottle at the maximum rate.

property.name: text
property.value: Filling the bottle at the in-flow rate (raw material buffer is empty).

property.name: text
property.value: Not filling a bottle. Collecting raw material.

property.name: text
property.value: Model of raw material buffer and bottle being filled.
